headings: To be active participants in our society, we must be aware of what is going on and how it affects our lives.
Interested in a career in Law?
What Can You Do With a Political Science Degree?
Why Earn My Political Science Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Our program aspires to educate free citizens, practiced in reflecting on their rights and responsibilities in a free society.

When you major in political science, you will be introduced to great achievements in science, art and ethical reflection through serious engagement with primary texts and current research. We cover everything from Texas, U.S. and world politics - to public policy, politics and mass media, and international relations. You will learn the basic principles and problems of American democracy and constitutional government and become prepared to think independently and engage effectively in politics.
Contact Information

OurPre-Law Advising programoffers assistance for students pursuing careers in law. Some popular areas of expertise for students pursuing law degrees include Family Law, Criminal Law and Business Law. Lawyers are also needed in virtually every business area to assist in the interpretation of rules and regulations. Graduates of our program have been admitted to many prestigious law schools, including Columbia, University of Texas at Austin, Georgetown, Baylor, Texas Tech and Harvard.

Our experienced faculty stay current on the latest state and national political issues. You can work side by side with them on research projects, and they’ll work alongside you to help you achieve your educational and career goals.
Program Faculty
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.

Earning your political science degree will open career doors in a variety of settings, including public administration, international affairs, business and finance, non-governmental and nonprofit agencies, teaching and academic research, and journalism.

Our graduates have been accepted to some of the most prestigious law and graduate schools in the nation. Internships in Washington, D.C., and San Angelo have prepared our students for careers on Capitol Hill and at all levels of government, and to start businesses and excel in the private sector.
Explore Career Possibilities

Gain valuable real-world experience through access to local representatives, class visits to the state legislature, and internships with local, state and U.S. government officials, as well as other professionals in a wide variety of career fields. You can also attend campus, regional and national seminars and conferences.
Broaden your worldview of the governments, justice systems, societies and cultures of other countries through a variety of summer study abroad programs.

We have a variety of student organizations that you can join for networking and professional development. Our groups include the Student Government Association, Young Democrats and College Republicans, plus chapters of the Pi Sigma Alpha national political science honor society and the Pi Gamma Mu social science honor society. All our organizations allow you to connect with faculty and other students.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.
Explore the Honors Advantage

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
